summary.span: Represents a character encoding.

span.span: Represents a character encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編碼是將一組 Unicode 字元轉換成位元組序列的處理程序。Encoding is the process of transforming a set of Unicode characters into a sequence of bytes. 相反地，解碼則是將編碼的位元組序列轉換成一組 Unicode 字元的程序。In contrast, decoding is the process of transforming a sequence of encoded bytes into a set of Unicode characters. 如需 Unicode 轉換格式 (UTFs) 和其他支援的編碼資訊，請參閱[字元編碼方式在.NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)。For information about the Unicode Transformation Formats (UTFs) and other encodings supported by , see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md). 請注意，旨在對 Unicode 字元，而不是任意的二進位資料，例如位元組陣列。Note that is intended to operate on Unicode characters instead of arbitrary binary data, such as byte arrays. 如果必須任意的二進位資料編碼為文字，您應該使用的通訊協定，例如這類實作的方法進行 uuencode 編碼。If you must encode arbitrary binary data into text, you should use a protocol such as uuencode, which is implemented by methods such as . .NET Framework 提供的下列實作類別，以支援目前的 Unicode 編碼方式和其他的編碼：The .NET Framework provides the following implementations of the class to support current Unicode encodings and other encodings: - 將 Unicode 字元編碼成單一的 7 位元 ASCII 字元。 encodes Unicode characters as single 7-bit ASCII characters. 這個編碼僅支援字元介於 U + 0000 與 U + 007F。This encoding only supports character values between U+0000 and U+007F. 字碼頁 20127。Code page 20127. 也可透過屬性。Also available through the property. - 使用 utf-7 編碼的 Unicode 字元編碼。 encodes Unicode characters using the UTF-7 encoding. 這種編碼方式支援所有的 Unicode 字元值。This encoding supports all Unicode character values. 字碼頁 65000。Code page 65000. 也可透過屬性。Also available through the property. - 使用 utf-8 編碼的 Unicode 字元編碼。 encodes Unicode characters using the UTF-8 encoding. 這種編碼方式支援所有的 Unicode 字元值。This encoding supports all Unicode character values. 字碼頁 65001。Code page 65001. 也可透過屬性。Also available through the property. - 將使用 utf-16 編碼的 Unicode 字元編碼。 encodes Unicode characters using the UTF-16 encoding. 支援兩個小的位元組由小到大和 big 位元組由小到大位元組順序。Both little endian and big endian byte orders are supported. 也可透過屬性和屬性。Also available through the property and the property. - 將使用 utf-32 編碼的 Unicode 字元編碼。 encodes Unicode characters using the UTF-32 encoding. 同時位元組由小到大 （字碼頁 12000） 和 big endian （字碼頁 12001） 位元組支援順序。Both little endian (code page 12000) and big endian (code page 12001) byte orders are supported. 也可透過屬性。Also available through the property. 類別主要是為不同的編碼方式和 Unicode 間轉換。The class is primarily intended to convert between different encodings and Unicode. 通常衍生 Unicode 類別的其中一個是正確的選擇，您的應用程式。Often one of the derived Unicode classes is the correct choice for your app. 使用方法，以取得其他編碼，並呼叫方法來取得一份所有編碼方式。Use the method to obtain other encodings, and call the method to get a list of all encodings. 下表列出.NET Framework 所支援的編碼。The following table lists the encodings supported by the .NET Framework. 它會列出每個編碼的字碼頁編號和值編碼的和屬性。It lists each encoding's code page number and the values of the encoding's and properties. 星號的最後一欄會指出.NET Framework 中，不論基礎平台原生支援的字碼頁。An asterisk in the last column indicates that the code page is natively supported by the .NET Framework, regardless of the underlying platform. 請注意，字碼頁的屬性會對應至國際標準不一定符合以完整模式和標準。Note that code pages whose property corresponds to an international standard do not necessarily comply in full with that standard. |字碼頁Code (Windows) 程式碼頁編碼。The following example calls the and methods to get the Greek (Windows) code page encoding. 它會比較，告訴您相等，然後對應顯示 Unicode 字碼指標，而每個字元的對應字碼頁值希臘字母方法呼叫所傳回的物件。It compares the objects returned by the method calls to show that they are equal, and then maps displays the Unicode code point and the corresponding code page value for each character in the Greek alphabet. [!code-csharp[System.Text.Encoding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.encoding/cs/getencoding1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.Encoding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.encoding/vb/getencoding1.vb#1)] 如果要轉換的資料僅適用於循序區塊 （例如從資料流讀取的資料），或如果資料量太大，它必須分割成較小的區塊，您應該使用或提供方法或方法，分別，是在衍生類別。If the data to be converted is available only in sequential blocks (such as data read from a stream) or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, you should use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively, of a derived class. Utf-16 和 utf-32 編碼器可以使用大到小的位元組順序 (最大顯著性位元組第一個) 或很少位元組由小到大位元組順序 (最小顯著性位元組第一個)。The UTF-16 and the UTF-32 encoders can use the big endian byte order (most significant byte first) or the little endian byte order (least significant byte first). 例如，英文大寫字母 (U + 0041) 序列化如下 （以十六進位方式）：For example, the Latin Capital Letter A (U+0041) is serialized as follows (in hexadecimal): - Utf-16 big 位元組由小到大位元組順序： 00 41UTF-16 big endian byte order: 00 41 - Utf-16 很少位元組由小到大位元組順序： 41 00UTF-16 little endian byte order: 41 00 - Utf-32 big 位元組由小到大位元組順序： 00 00 00 41UTF-32 big endian byte order: 00 00 00 41 - Utf-32 少位元組由小到大位元組順序： 41 00 00 00UTF-32 little endian byte order: 41 00 00 00 它會儲存使用原生的位元組順序的 Unicode 字元通常更有效率。It is generally more efficient to store Unicode characters using the native byte order. 例如，最好使用位元組由小到大位元組順序少位元組由小到大的平台，例如 Intel 電腦上。For example, it is better to use the little endian byte order on little endian platforms, such as Intel computers. 方法會擷取位元組陣列，其中包含位元組順序標示 (BOM)。The method retrieves an array of bytes that includes the byte order mark (BOM). 如果這個位元組陣列編碼的資料流做為前置詞，將有助於識別使用的編碼格式的解碼器。If this byte array is prefixed to an encoded stream, it helps the decoder to identify the encoding format used. 如需有關位元組順序和位元組順序標記的詳細資訊，請參閱 Unicode 標準[Unicode 首頁](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37123)。For more information on byte order and the byte order mark, see The Unicode Standard at the [Unicode home page](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37123). 請注意，編碼類別可讓錯誤：Note that the encoding classes allow errors to: - 以無訊息模式變更為"？"字元。Silently change to a "?" character. - 使用"best fit"字元。Use a "best fit" character. - 藉由使用應用程式特定的行為變更和具有 U + FFFD Unicode 取代字元類別。Change to an application-specific behavior through use of the and classes with the U+FFFD Unicode replacement character. 您應該在發生任何資料流的錯誤擲回例外狀況。You should throw an exception on any data stream error. 應用程式會使用"throwonerror 」 旗標時適用或使用和類別。An app either uses a "throwonerror" flag when applicable or uses the and classes. 通常不建議自動調整的後援，因為它可能會造成資料遺失或混淆，而且比簡單的字元取代慢。Best fit fallback is often not recommended because it can cause data loss or confusion and is slower than simple character replacements. ANSI 編碼，自動調整的行為是預設值。For ANSI encodings, the best fit behavior is the default. ## Examples 下列範例會將字串轉換到另一種編碼。The following example converts a string from one encoding to another. > [!NOTE] > 位元組 [] 陣列是在此範例中包含的編碼的資料的唯一類型。The byte[] array is the only type in this example that contains the encoded data. .NET Char 和字串型別是 Unicode，因此呼叫解碼回 Unicode 資料。The .NET Char and String types are themselves Unicode, so the call decodes the data back to Unicode. [!code-cpp[System.Text.Encoding.Convert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.Encoding.Convert Example/CPP/convert.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.Encoding.Convert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.Encoding.Convert Example/CS/convert.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.Encoding.Convert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.Encoding.Convert Example/VB/convert.vb#1)]

span.span: An encoding for the ASCII (7-bit) character set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASCII 字元都是從 U + 0000 到 U + 007F 限制為最低的 128 個 Unicode 字元。ASCII characters are limited to the lowest 128 Unicode characters, from U+0000 to U+007F. 選取您的應用程式的 ASCII 編碼方式，請考慮下列各項：When selecting the ASCII encoding for your app, consider the following: - ASCII 編碼方式適合通常需要 ASCII 的通訊協定。The ASCII encoding is usually appropriate for protocols that require ASCII. - 如果您需要 8 位元編碼 （這有時會誤稱為"ASCII"），utf-8 編碼建議透過 ASCII 編碼方式。If you requires 8-bit encoding (which is sometimes incorrectly referred to as "ASCII"), the UTF-8 encoding is recommended over the ASCII encoding. 字元 0-7F，結果都一樣，但使用的 utf-8 藉由使用可顯示的所有 Unicode 字元表示法可避免資料遺失。For the characters 0-7F, the results are identical, but use of UTF-8 avoids data loss by allowing representation of all Unicode characters that are representable. 請注意，ASCII 編碼方式已 8 位元，可以讓惡意使用，模稜兩可的 utf-8 編碼方式會移除相關的 8 位元的模稜兩可。Note that the ASCII encoding has an 8th bit ambiguity that can allow malicious use, but the UTF-8 encoding removes ambiguity about the 8th bit. - 在.NET Framework 2.0 版之前的.NET Framework 會允許詐騙略過的 8 位元。Prior to the .NET Framework version 2.0, the .NET Framework allowed spoofing by ignoring the 8th bit. 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，非 ASCII 字碼指標回復期間解碼。Beginning with the .NET Framework 2.0, non-ASCII code points fall back during decoding. 這個屬性所傳回的物件可能沒有適當的行為，您的應用程式。The object that is returned by this property might not have the appropriate behavior for your app. 它會使用取代後援，來取代無法編碼的每個字串和無法解碼的每個位元組以問號 ("？") 字元。It uses replacement fallback to replace each string that it cannot encode and each byte that it cannot decode with a question mark ("?") character. 相反地，您可以呼叫方法來具現化物件可能是其後援或，如下列範例所示。Instead, you can call the method to instantiate an object whose fallback is either an or a , as the following example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.Text.Encoding.ASCII#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.encoding.ascii/cs/encoding.ascii2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.Encoding.ASCII#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.encoding.ascii/vb/encoding.ascii2.vb#1)] ## Examples 下列範例會示範 ASCII 編碼字元的 ASCII 範圍之外的效果。The following example demonstrates the effect of the ASCII encoding on characters that are outside the ASCII range. [!code-cpp[System.Text.Encoding.ASCII Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.Encoding.ASCII Example/CPP/ascii.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.Encoding.ASCII Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.Encoding.ASCII Example/CS/ascii.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.Encoding.ASCII Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.Encoding.ASCII Example/VB/ascii.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複製為可寫入即使原始物件是唯讀的。The clone is writable even if the original object is read-only. 因此，您可修改複製品的屬性。Therefore, the properties of the clone can be modified. 物件的淺層複本是只是物件的副本。A shallow copy of an object is a copy of the object only. 如果物件包含其他物件的參考，則淺層複製不會建立參考物件的複本。If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects. 它改為參考原始物件。It refers to the original objects instead. 相較之下，物件的複本，以及該物件直接或間接參考的所有項目會建立物件的深層複本。In contrast, a deep copy of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件都代表無法編碼的位元組序列解碼成字元時叫用錯誤處理常式。The object represents an error handler that is invoked when an encoded byte sequence cannot be decoded into a character. 支援下列處理常式類型的任何一個：Any one of the following handler types is supported: - 自動調整後援處理常式，以某些合適的替代字元，取代無法解碼的位元組。A best-fit fallback handler, which replaces bytes that cannot be decoded with some suitable replacement character. - 取代後援處理常式，其中某些任意的取代字元，取代無法解碼的位元組。A replacement fallback handler, which replaces bytes that cannot be decoded with some arbitrary replacement character. .NET Framework 包含一個取代後援處理常式， ，其預設值以問號取代無法解碼的位元組 ("？") 字元。The .NET Framework includes one replacement fallback handler, , which by default replaces bytes that cannot be decoded with a question mark ("?") character. - 例外狀況後援處理常式，其無法解碼位元組時，會擲回例外狀況。An exception fallback handler, which throws an exception when bytes cannot be decoded. .NET Framework 包含一個例外狀況後援處理常式， ，哪些則會擲回時無法解碼的位元組。The .NET Framework includes one exception fallback handler, , which throws a when bytes cannot be decoded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 不同的電腦可以使用不同的編碼預設值，並在單一電腦上的預設編碼方式可以變更。Different computers can use different encodings as the default, and the default encoding can change on a single computer. 如果您使用編碼方式來編碼和解碼資料流處理的電腦之間或在不同的時間，在相同電腦上擷取的資料，它可能會轉譯該資料不正確。If you use the encoding to encode and decode data streamed between computers or retrieved at different times on the same computer, it may translate that data incorrectly. 此外，編碼傳回屬性可用於自動調整的後援對應至字碼頁所支援的字元不支援的字元。In addition, the encoding returned by the property uses best-fit fallback to map unsupported characters to characters supported by the code page. 基於這些理由，不建議使用預設編碼方式。For these reasons, using the default encoding is not recommended. 為確保正確解碼編碼的位元組，您應該使用 Unicode 編碼方式，例如或。To ensure that encoded bytes are decoded properly, you should use a Unicode encoding, such as or . 您也可以使用較高層級的通訊協定來確保相同的格式用於編碼和解碼。You could also use a higher-level protocol to ensure that the same format is used for encoding and decoding. ### .NET Framework 中的預設屬性The Default property in the .NET Framework 在.NET Framework 在 Windows 桌面上，屬性一律會取得系統的使用中的字碼頁，並建立對應至它的物件。In the .NET Framework on the Windows desktop, the property always gets the system's active code page and creates a object that corresponds to it. 作用中的字碼頁可能包含依字碼頁設定以及不同的其他字元的 ASCII 字元的 ANSI 字碼頁。The active code page may be an ANSI code page, which includes the ASCII character set along with additional characters that vary by code page. 因為所有根據 ANSI 字碼頁編碼方式會遺失資料，請考慮使用改為編碼。Because all encodings based on ANSI code pages lose data, consider using the encoding instead. Utf-8 通常在 U + 00 到 U + 7F 範圍相同，但可以編碼字元，而不會遺失 ASCII 範圍之外。UTF-8 is often identical in the U+00 to U+7F range, but can encode characters outside the ASCII range without loss. ## .NET Core 上的預設屬性The Default property on .NET Core 在.NET Core屬性一律會傳回。On .NET Core, the property always returns the . Utf-8 支援的所有作業系統 （Windows、 Linux 及 Max OS X） 上執行的.NET Core 應用程式。UTF-8 is supported on all the operating systems (Windows, Linux, and Max OS X) on which .NET Core applications run.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個執行個體會被視為相等，如果它們對應到相同的字碼頁以及其`EncoderFallback`和`DecoderFallback`物件是否相等。Two instances of are considered equal if they correspond to the same code page and their `EncoderFallback` and `DecoderFallback` objects are equal. 特別是，所有的衍生的字碼頁有字碼頁為 0 而且其後援通常`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic.NET)。In particular, derived code pages all have a code page of 0 and their fallbacks are normally `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic .NET). 因此，全部都視為等於另一個。Thus they are all considered equal to one another. 結果，代表當用來填入雜湊表，所有衍生編碼比較相等，並分為相同的雜湊資料表位置。One consequence is that when is used to populate a hash table, all derived encodings compare equal and fall into the same hash table slot. ## Examples 下列範例會取得兩個執行個體相同的編碼 （字碼頁的一個），另一個名稱，並檢查它們相等。The following example gets two instances of the same encoding (one by codepage and another by name), and checks their equality. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算所需的精確陣列大小儲存產生的位元組，呼叫方法。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting bytes, call the method. 若要計算最大陣列大小，請呼叫方法。To calculate the maximum array size, call the method. 方法通常可讓較少的記憶體配置而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 方法會判斷多少個位元組會導致一組 Unicode 字元編碼和方法會執行實際的編碼方式。The method determines how many bytes result in encoding a set of Unicode characters, and the method performs the actual encoding. 方法預期離散的轉換，相對於方法，用來處理單一輸入資料流上的多個轉換。The method expects discrete conversions, in contrast to the method, which handles multiple conversions on a single input stream. 數個版本的和支援。Several versions of and are supported. 使用這些方法的一些程式設計考量如下：The following are some programming considerations for use of these methods: - 您的應用程式可能需要許多輸入的字元，為字碼頁編碼，並處理使用多個呼叫的字元。Your app might need to encode many input characters to a code page and process the characters using multiple calls. 在此情況下，您可能需要呼叫，為永續性的狀態列入考量之間維持狀態物件正在使用。In this case, you probably need to maintain state between calls, taking into account the state that is persisted by the object being used. - 如果您的應用程式會處理字串輸入，您應該使用的字串版本方法。If your app handles string inputs, you should use the string versions of the method. - Unicode 字元緩衝區版本的允許一些快速的技術，特別是使用多個呼叫使用物件或插入到現有的緩衝區。The Unicode character buffer version of allows some fast techniques, particularly with multiple calls using the object or inserting into existing buffers. 請記住，不過，這個版本的方法是有時候不安全，因為指標是必要。Bear in mind, however, that this method version is sometimes unsafe, since pointers are required. - 如果您的應用程式必須轉換大量資料，您應該重複使用的輸出緩衝區。If your app must convert a large amount of data, you should reuse the output buffer. 在此情況下，支援位元組陣列的版本是最佳選擇。In this case, the version that supports byte arrays is the best choice. - 請考慮使用方法，而非。Consider using the method instead of . 轉換方法將盡可能最多資料，並輸出緩衝區太小而如果未擲回例外狀況。The conversion method converts as much data as possible, and does throw an exception if the output buffer is too small. 如果是連續的資料流的編碼，這個方法通常是最佳選擇。For continuous encoding of a stream, this method is often the best choice. ## Examples 下列範例會決定編碼的字元陣列所需的位元組數目、 編碼字元，並顯示產生的位元組數。The following example determines the number of bytes required to encode a character array, encodes the characters, and displays the resulting bytes. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算確切的陣列大小的需要儲存產生的位元組，呼叫方法。To calculate the exact array size that requires to store the resulting bytes, call the method. 若要計算最大陣列大小，請呼叫方法。To calculate the maximum array size, call the method. 方法通常可讓較少的記憶體配置而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 如果要轉換的數據僅在順序塊中可用（例如從流中讀取的數據），或者如果數據量太大以至於需要將其分成較小的塊，則應使用提供的或對象 分別由或種方法派生的類。If the data to be converted is available only in sequential blocks (such as data read from a stream) or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, you should use the or the object provided by the or the method, respectively, of a derived class. 方法會判斷多少個位元組會導致一組 Unicode 字元編碼和方法會執行實際的編碼方式。The method determines how many bytes result in encoding a set of Unicode characters, and the method performs the actual encoding. 方法預期離散的轉換，相對於方法，用來處理單一輸入資料流上的多個轉換。The method expects discrete conversions, in contrast to the method, which handles multiple conversions on a single input stream. 數個版本的和支援。Several versions of and are supported. 使用這些方法的一些程式設計考量如下：The following are some programming considerations for use of these methods: - 您的應用程式可能需要許多輸入的字元，為字碼頁編碼，並處理使用多個呼叫的字元。Your app might need to encode many input characters to a code page and process the characters using multiple calls. 在此情況下，您可能需要呼叫，為永續性的狀態列入考量之間維持狀態物件正在使用。In this case, you probably need to maintain state between calls, taking into account the state that is persisted by the object being used. （例如的字元順序，包括 surrogate 字組可能的結尾為高 surrogate。(For example, a character sequence that includes surrogate pairs might end with a high surrogate. 會記住該高 surrogate，使它可以結合下列呼叫的開頭為低 surrogate。The will remember that high surrogate so that it can be combined with a low surrogate at the beginning of a following call. 無法將送往的字元會維護狀態， 。) won't be able to maintain the state, so the character will be sent to the .) - 如果您的應用程式會處理字串輸入，您應該使用的字串版本。If your app handles string inputs, you should use the string version of . - Unicode 字元緩衝區版本的允許一些快速的技術，特別是使用多個呼叫使用物件或插入到現有的緩衝區。The Unicode character buffer version of allows some fast techniques, particularly with multiple calls using the object or inserting into existing buffers. 請記住，不過，這個版本的方法是有時候不安全，因為指標是必要。Bear in mind, however, that this method version is sometimes unsafe, since pointers are required. - 如果您的應用程式必須轉換大量資料，它應該重複使用的輸出緩衝區。If your app must convert a large amount of data, it should reuse the output buffer. 在此情況下，支援位元組陣列的版本是最佳選擇。In this case, the version that supports byte arrays is the best choice. - 請考慮使用方法，而非。Consider using the method instead of . 轉換方法將盡可能最多資料，並輸出緩衝區太小而如果未擲回例外狀況。The conversion method converts as much data as possible, and does throw an exception if the output buffer is too small. 如果是連續的資料流的編碼，這個方法通常是最佳選擇。For continuous encoding of a stream, this method is often the best choice.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得字元的輸入的位元組序列。 gets characters from an input byte sequence. 不同於因為需要離散的轉換，而可供多個行程上的單一輸入資料流。 is different than because expects discrete conversions, while is designed for multiple passes on a single input stream. 如果要轉換的資料僅適用於循序區塊 （例如從資料流讀取的資料），或如果資料量太大，它必須分割成較小的區塊，您應該使用或提供方法或方法，分別，是在衍生類別。If the data to be converted is available only in sequential blocks (such as data read from a stream) or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, you should use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively, of a derived class. **請注意**這個方法是對 Unicode 字元，不是在任意的二進位資料，例如位元組陣列。**Note** This method is intended to operate on Unicode characters, not on arbitrary binary data, such as byte arrays. 如果您需要將任意的二進位資料編碼成文字，您應該使用的通訊協定，例如這類實作的方法進行 uuencode 編碼。If you need to encode arbitrary binary data into text, you should use a protocol such as uuencode, which is implemented by methods such as . 方法會判斷多少個字元產生的位元組序列解碼和方法會執行實際的解碼。The method determines how many characters result in decoding a sequence of bytes, and the method performs the actual decoding. 方法預期離散的轉換，相對於方法，用來處理多個行程上的單一輸入資料流。The method expects discrete conversions, in contrast to the method, which handles multiple passes on a single input stream. 數個版本的和支援。Several versions of and are supported. 使用這些方法的一些程式設計考量如下：The following are some programming considerations for use of these methods: - 您的應用程式可能需要解碼字碼頁從多個輸入的位元組與處理使用多個呼叫的位元組。Your app might need to decode multiple input bytes from a code page and process the bytes using multiple calls. 在此情況下，您可能需要維護狀態之間的呼叫，因為批次中處理時，才能中斷位元組序列。In this case, you probably need to maintain state between calls, because byte sequences can be interrupted when processed in batches. (例如 iso-2022 shift 順序的一部分可能結束一個呼叫，並繼續到下一行的開頭呼叫。(For example, part of an ISO-2022 shift sequence may end one call and continue at the beginning of the next call. 會呼叫此後援的那些不完整的順序，但會記住這些時序的下一個呼叫。) will call the fallback for those incomplete sequences, but will remember those sequences for the next call.) - 如果您的應用程式會處理字串輸出，則建議使用方法。If your app handles string outputs, it is recommended to use the method. 由於這個方法必須檢查字串長度，而且配置緩衝區，會稍微慢一點，但產生型別是會優先。Since this method must check string length and allocate a buffer, it is slightly slower, but the resulting type is to be preferred. - 位元組版本允許一些快速的技術，特別是使用大型緩衝區多次呼叫。The byte version of allows some fast techniques, particularly with multiple calls to large buffers. 請記住，不過，這個版本的方法是有時候不安全，因為指標是必要。Bear in mind, however, that this method version is sometimes unsafe, since pointers are required. - 如果您的應用程式必須轉換大量資料，它應該重複使用的輸出緩衝區。If your app must convert a large amount of data, it should reuse the output buffer. 在此情況下，[\]、 Int32、 Int32、 Char\ 支援輸出字元的版本緩衝區是最佳選擇。In this case, the [\], Int32, Int32, Char\ version that supports output character buffers is the best choice. - 請考慮使用方法，而非。Consider using the method instead of . 轉換方法會將盡可能最多資料，並擲回例外狀況，如果輸出緩衝區太小。The conversion method converts as much data as possible and throws an exception if the output buffer is too small. 連續解碼資料流，此方法通常是最佳選擇。For continuous decoding of a stream, this method is often the best choice. ## Examples 下列範例會將字串編碼成位元組陣列，然後再將位元組解碼成字元陣列。The following example encodes a string into an array of bytes, and then decodes the bytes into an array of characters. (例如 iso-2022 shift 順序的一部分可能結束一個呼叫，並繼續到下一行的開頭呼叫。(For example, part of an ISO-2022 shift sequence may end one call and continue at the beginning of the next call. 會呼叫此後援的那些不完整的順序，但會記住這些時序的下一個呼叫。) will call the fallback for those incomplete sequences, but will remember those sequences for the next call.) - 如果您的應用程式會處理字串輸出，則建議使用方法。If your app handles string outputs, it is recommended to use the method. 由於這個方法必須檢查字串長度，而且配置緩衝區，會稍微慢一點，但產生型別是會優先。Since this method must check string length and allocate a buffer, it is slightly slower, but the resulting type is to be preferred. - 位元組版本允許一些快速的技術，特別是使用大型緩衝區多次呼叫。The byte version of allows some fast techniques, particularly with multiple calls to large buffers. 請記住，不過，這個版本的方法是有時候不安全，因為指標是必要。Bear in mind, however, that this method version is sometimes unsafe, since pointers are required. - 如果您的應用程式必須轉換大量資料，它應該重複使用的輸出緩衝區。If your app must convert a large amount of data, it should reuse the output buffer. 在此情況下，[\]、 Int32、 Int32、 Char\ 支援輸出字元的版本緩衝區是最佳選擇。In this case, the [\], Int32, Int32, Char\ version that supports output character buffers is the best choice. - 請考慮使用方法，而非。Consider using the method instead of . 轉換方法會將盡可能最多資料，並擲回例外狀況，如果輸出緩衝區太小。The conversion method converts as much data as possible and throws an exception if the output buffer is too small. 連續解碼資料流，此方法通常是最佳選擇。For continuous decoding of a stream, this method is often the best choice. ## Examples 下列範例會將字串編碼成位元組陣列，並再將位元組範圍解碼成字元陣列。The following example encodes a string into an array of bytes, and then decodes a range of the bytes into an array of characters. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將字元的循序區塊轉換成位元組，以類似方式循序區塊這個類別的方法。The method converts sequential blocks of characters into sequential blocks of bytes, in a manner similar to the method of this class. 不過，維護呼叫，讓它正確編碼的字元序列跨越區塊之間的狀態資訊。However, a maintains state information between calls so it correctly encodes character sequences that span blocks. 也保留尾端字元的資料區塊的結尾，並在下一步的編碼作業中使用尾端字元。The also preserves trailing characters at the end of data blocks and uses the trailing characters in the next encoding operation. 例如，資料區塊可能會不相符的高 surrogate，以結束，而且比對的低 surrogate 可能在下一個資料區塊中。For example, a data block might end with an unmatched high surrogate, and the matching low surrogate might be in the next data block. 因此，和進行網路傳輸，而檔案作業很實用是因為這些作業經常要處理而不是完整的資料流的資料區塊。Therefore, and are useful for network transmission and file operations, because those operations often deal with blocks of data instead of a complete data stream.

span.para: 預設實作會傳回呼叫和方法目前。您必須覆寫此方法以傳回，會維護其呼叫之間的狀態。
The default implementation returns a that calls the and methods of the current . You must override this method to return a that maintains its state between calls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 後援處理常式的編碼方式類型取決於`codepage`。The fallback handler depends on the encoding type of `codepage`. 如果`codepage`程式碼頁面或雙位元組字元集 (DBCS) 編碼方式，使用自動調整後援處理常式。If `codepage` is a code page or double-byte character set (DBCS) encoding, a best-fit fallback handler is used. 否則，會使用取代後援處理常式。Otherwise, a replacement fallback handler is used. 這些後援處理常式可能不適合您的應用程式。These fallback handlers may not be appropriate for your app. 若要指定所指定的編碼方式使用後援處理常式`codepage`，您可以呼叫多載。To specify the fallback handler used by the encoding specified by `codepage`, you can call the overload. 方法依賴基礎的平台，以支援大部分的字碼頁。The method relies on the underlying platform to support most code pages. 不過，.NET Framework 原本就支援某些編碼方式。However, the .NET Framework natively supports some encodings. 如需字碼頁的清單，請參閱類別主題。For a list of code pages, see the class topic. 或者，您可以呼叫方法來取得陣列的包含所有編碼方式的相關資訊的物件。Alternatively, you can call the method to get an array of objects that contains information about all encodings. 除了可在特定平台版本的.NET Framework 中，在本質上支援的編碼方式方法會傳回可供註冊的任何其他編碼物件。In addition to the encodings that are intrinsically supported on a specific platform version of the .NET Framework, the method returns any additional encodings that are made available by registering an object. 如果由多個已註冊的相同編碼物件，這個方法會傳回已註冊的最後一個。If the same encoding has been registered by multiple objects, this method returns the last one registered. 您也可以提供的值為 0`codepage`引數。You can also supply a value of 0 for the `codepage` argument. 精確的行為取決於是否任何編碼已經提供註冊物件：Its precise behavior depends on whether any encodings have been made available by registering an object: - 如果已註冊一個或多個編碼提供者，它就會傳回已選擇要傳回的編碼方式時的最後一個登錄提供者的編碼方式方法傳遞`codepage`引數為 0。If one or more encoding providers have been registered, it returns the encoding of the last registered provider that has chosen to return a encoding when the method is passed a `codepage` argument of 0. - 在.NET Framework 中，如果沒有編碼提供者已註冊之後，如果是已註冊編碼提供者，或如果沒有任何已註冊編碼提供者處理`codepage`值為 0 時，它會傳回作業系統的作用中的字碼頁。On the .NET Framework, if no encoding provider has been registered, if the is the registered encoding provider, or if no registered encoding provider handles a `codepage` value of 0, it returns the operating system's active code page. 若要判斷在 Windows 系統上的作用中的字碼頁，呼叫 Windows [GetACP](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318070.aspx)函式會從.NET Framework 在 Windows 桌面上。To determine the active code page on Windows systems, call the Windows [GetACP](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318070.aspx) function from the .NET Framework on the Windows desktop. - 在.NET Core，如果沒有已經註冊編碼提供者，或如果沒有任何已註冊編碼提供者會處理`codepage`值為 0 時，它會傳回。On .NET Core, if no encoding provider has been registered or if no registered encoding provider handles a `codepage` value of 0, it returns the . > [!NOTE] > 某些不支援的字碼頁原因狀況，而其他人會導致。Some unsupported code pages cause an to be thrown, whereas others cause a . 因此，您的程式碼必須攔截所有例外狀況的例外狀況 > 一節所示。Therefore, your code must catch all exceptions indicated in the Exceptions section. > [!NOTE] > ANSI 字碼頁不同的電腦上可能有不同，而且可以變更導致資料損毀的單一電腦上。The ANSI code pages can be different on different computers and can change on a single computer, leading to data corruption. 基於這個理由，如果作用中的字碼頁為 ANSI 字碼頁編碼和解碼資料使用的預設字碼頁所傳回`Encoding.GetEncoding(0)`不建議使用。For this reason, if the active code page is an ANSI code page, encoding and decoding data using the default code page returned by `Encoding.GetEncoding(0)` is not recommended. 為了最一致的結果，您應該使用 Unicode 編碼方式，例如 （字碼頁 65001） utf-8 或 utf-16，而不特定字碼頁。For the most consistent results, you should use a Unicode encoding, such as UTF-8 (code page 65001) or UTF-16, instead of a specific code page. 傳回具有預設設定的快取執行個體。 returns a cached instance with default settings. 您應該使用衍生類別的建構函式來取得執行個體使用不同的設定。You should use the constructors of derived classes to get an instance with different settings. 例如，類別會提供可讓您啟用錯誤偵測的建構函式。For example, the class provides a constructor that lets you enable error detection. ## Examples 下列範例會取得兩個執行個體相同的編碼 （字碼頁一個），另一個名稱，並檢查它們相等。The following example gets two instances of the same encoding (one by code page and another by name), and checks their equality. [!code-cpp[sys.txt.fallbackEncRpl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.txt.fallbackEncRpl/cpp/fallEncRpl.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[sys.txt.fallbackEncRpl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.txt.fallbackEncRpl/cs/fallEncRpl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.txt.fallbackEncRpl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.txt.fallbackEncRpl/vb/fallEncRpl.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回一份支援的編碼方式，唯一區別在於字碼頁。This method returns a list of supported encodings, uniquely distinguished by code page. 列出支援的編碼方式的資料表，請參閱類別主題。For a table that lists the supported encodings, see the class topic. > [!NOTE] > 所傳回支援的編碼方式的清單方法不包含任何額外的編碼方式，可由任何呼叫所註冊的實作方法。The list of supported encodings returned by the method does not include any additional encodings made available by any implementations that were registered by calls to the method. 編碼 50220 和 50222 為兩者具有名稱"iso-2022年-jp"相關聯，但並不相同。Encodings 50220 and 50222 are both associated with the name "iso-2022-jp", but they are not identical. 編碼 50220 將半形片假名字元轉換為全形片假名字元，而編碼 50222 使用 shift 鍵輸入/shift out 順序來編碼半形片假名字元。Encoding 50220 converts half-width Katakana characters to full-width Katakana characters, whereas encoding 50222 uses a shift-in/shift-out sequence to encode half-width Katakana characters. 編碼 50222 的顯示名稱是 「 日文 (Jis-allow 1 byte Kana-因此 / SI) 」 以便區別編碼 50220，具有顯示名稱 「 日文 (JIS) 」。The display name for encoding 50222 is "Japanese (JIS-Allow 1 byte Kana - SO/SI)" to distinguish it from encoding 50220, which has the display name "Japanese (JIS)". 如果您要求會編碼名稱"iso-2022年-jp".NET Framework 傳回 50220 的編碼方式。If you request the encoding name "iso-2022-jp", the .NET Framework returns encoding 50220. 不過，適用於您的應用程式的編碼方式而定的半形片假名字元慣用的處理方式。However, the encoding that is appropriate for your app depends on the preferred treatment of the half-width Katakana characters. 若要取得特定的編碼方式，您應該使用方法。To get a specific encoding, you should use the method. 有時候用來對使用者顯示一份檔案中的編碼**存** 對話方塊。 is sometimes used to present the user with a list of encodings in a File **Save as** dialog box. 不過，許多非 Unicode 編碼都是不完整，而且轉譯至許多字元"？"，或不同平台上有稍微不同的行為。However, many non-Unicode encodings are either incomplete and translate many characters to "?", or have subtly different behavior on different platforms. 請考慮使用 utf-8 或 utf-16 作為預設值。Consider using UTF-8 or UTF-16 as the default. ## Examples 下列範例會檢查每個編碼的布林屬性值。The following example checks the values of the Boolean properties of each encoding. remarks.format: ## Remarks `charCount`參數會指定實際數目代表 Unicode 字元進行編碼，因為.NET Framework 內部使用 utf-16 代表 Unicode 字元的物件。The `charCount` parameter actually specifies the number of objects that represent the Unicode characters to encode, because the .NET Framework internally uses UTF-16 to represent Unicode characters. 因此，大部分的 Unicode 字元可以表示一個物件，但由 surrogate 字組，例如，將 Unicode 字元需要兩個物件。Consequently, most Unicode characters can be represented by one object, but a Unicode character represented by a surrogate pair, for example, requires two objects. 若要計算所需的精確陣列大小儲存產生的位元組，您應該使用方法。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting bytes, you should use the method. 若要計算最大陣列大小，請使用方法。To calculate the maximum array size, use the method. 方法通常可讓較少的記憶體配置而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 擷取最壞情況的數目，包括最壞的情況下，針對目前所選。 retrieves a worst-case number, including the worst case for the currently selected . 如果是可能的大型字串、 選擇後援擷取大數值，特別是在最壞的情況下的編碼方式涉及切換每個字元的模式的情況下。If a fallback is chosen with a potentially large string, retrieves large values, particularly in cases where the worst case for the encoding involves switching modes for every character. 比方說，這種情形的 ISO 2022 DE-CH。For example, this can happen for ISO-2022-JP. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱部落格文章:"[Encoding.GetMaxByteCount() 與 Encoding.GetMaxCharCount() 是什麼？](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=153702)"For more information, see the blog entry "[What's with Encoding.GetMaxByteCount() and Encoding.GetMaxCharCount()?](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=153702)" (http://blogs.msdn.com/shawnste/archive/2005/03/02/383903.aspx).(http://blogs.msdn.com/shawnste/archive/2005/03/02/383903.aspx). 在大部分情況下，這個方法會擷取針對小型字串合理的值。In most cases, this method retrieves reasonable values for small strings. 您必須選擇使用極大的緩衝區，攔截錯誤的少數情況下，當更合理的緩衝區太小而很大的字串。For large strings, you might have to choose between using very large buffers and catching errors in the rare case when a more reasonable buffer is too small. 您也可以考慮不同的方法，使用或。You might also want to consider a different approach using or . 當使用，您應配置輸入緩衝區的大小上限為基礎的輸出緩衝區。When using , you should allocate the output buffer based on the maximum size of the input buffer. 如果輸出緩衝區的大小限制，您可能會使用方法。If the output buffer is constrained in size, you might use the method. 請注意，會考量先前的解碼器作業潛在剩餘的 surrogate。Note that considers potential leftover surrogates from a previous decoder operation. 解碼器，因為傳遞的值為 1 到方法會擷取到單一位元組編碼方式，例如 ASCII 2。Because of the decoder, passing a value of 1 to the method retrieves 2 for a single-byte encoding, such as ASCII. 您應該使用如果這項資訊是必要的屬性。You should use the property if this information is necessary. > [!NOTE] > `GetMaxByteCount(N)` 不一定是相同的值`N* GetMaxByteCount(1)`。`GetMaxByteCount(N)` is not necessarily the same value as `N* GetMaxByteCount(1)`. ## Examples 下列範例會決定編碼的字元陣列所需的位元組數目、 編碼字元，並顯示產生的位元組數。The following example determines the number of bytes required to encode a character array, encodes the characters, and displays the resulting bytes. [!code-cpp[System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes_CharArr#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.Encoding.GetBytes_CharArr/CPP/getbytes_chararr.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes_CharArr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.Encoding.GetBytes_CharArr/CS/getbytes_chararr.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes_CharArr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.Encoding.GetBytes_CharArr/VB/getbytes_chararr.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks （選擇性）物件所提供的是可以加在編碼程序所產生的位元組序列的位元組陣列前序編碼。Optionally, the object provides a preamble that is an array of bytes that can be prefixed to the sequence of bytes resulting from the encoding process. 如果前序編碼包含位元組順序標記 （在 Unicode 字碼指標 U + FEFF)，將有助於判斷位元組順序的轉換格式或 UTF-8 解碼器。If the preamble contains a byte order mark (in Unicode, code point U+FEFF), it helps the decoder determine the byte order and the transformation format or UTF. Unicode 位元組順序標記 (BOM) （以十六進位方式） 的序列化，如下所示：The Unicode byte order mark (BOM) is serialized as follows (in hexadecimal): - UTF-8: EF BB BFUTF-8: EF BB BF - Utf-16 big 位元組由小到大位元組順序： FE FFUTF-16 big endian byte order: FE FF - Utf-16 很少位元組由小到大位元組順序： FF FEUTF-16 little endian byte order: FF FE - Utf-32 big 位元組由小到大位元組順序： 00 00 FE FFUTF-32 big endian byte order: 00 00 FE FF - Utf-32 少位元組由小到大位元組順序： FF FE 00 00UTF-32 little endian byte order: FF FE 00 00 您應該使用 BOM，因為它會提供幾乎特定的編碼的檔案已遺失的參考識別物件，例如，未標記，或不當標記 web 資料或儲存時商務的隨機文字檔案不提供支援具有國際考量或其他資料。You should use the BOM, because it provides nearly certain identification of an encoding for files that otherwise have lost reference to the object, for example, untagged or improperly tagged web data or random text files stored when a business did not have international concerns or other data. 如果資料一致的方式和適當地標記，最好是 utf-8 或 utf-16，就能避免通常使用者的問題。Often user problems might be avoided if data is consistently and properly tagged, preferably in UTF-8 or UTF-16. 提供編碼類型的標準，BOM 是多餘的。For standards that provide an encoding type, a BOM is somewhat redundant. 不過，它可以用來幫助伺服器傳送正確的編碼方式標頭。However, it can be used to help a server send the correct encoding header. 或者，它可用來當做後援以防編碼遺失時。Alternatively, it can be used as a fallback in case the encoding is otherwise lost. 有一些缺點，以包含 BOM。There are some disadvantages to using a BOM. 例如，了解如何限制使用 BOM 的資料庫欄位很難。For example, knowing how to limit the database fields that use a BOM can be difficult. 串連的檔案可以也會是問題，比方說，例如合併檔案時不必要的字元可能會結束中間資料的方式。Concatenation of files can be a problem also, for example, when files are merged in such a way that an unnecessary character can end up in the middle of data. 儘管有一些缺點，不過，BOM 使用建議。In spite of the few disadvantages, however, the use of a BOM is highly recommended. 如需有關位元組順序和位元組順序標記的詳細資訊，請參閱 Unicode 標準[Unicode 首頁](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37123)。For more information on byte order and the byte order mark, see The Unicode Standard at the [Unicode home page](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37123). > [!CAUTION] > 若要確保正確解碼的編碼的位元組，您應該作為前置詞與前序編碼的位元組。To ensure that the encoded bytes are decoded properly, you should prefix encoded bytes with a preamble. 不過，大部分的編碼方式不會提供前序編碼。However, most encodings do not provide a preamble. 為確保正確解碼的編碼的位元組，您應該使用 Unicode 編碼方式，也就是， ，或，與前序編碼。To ensure that the encoded bytes are decoded properly, you should use a Unicode encoding, that is, , , or , with a preamble. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷前序編碼為基礎的編碼方式的位元組順序。The following example determines the byte order of the encoding based on the preamble. [!code-cpp[System.Text.Encoding.GetPreamble Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.Encoding.GetPreamble Example/CPP/preamble.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.Encoding.GetPreamble Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.Encoding.GetPreamble Example/CS/preamble.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.Encoding.GetPreamble Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.Encoding.GetPreamble Example/VB/preamble.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要轉換的資料僅適用於循序區塊 （例如從資料流讀取的資料），或如果資料量太大，它必須分割成較小的區塊，您應該使用所傳回物件deri 方法攝影類別。If the data to be converted is available only in sequential blocks (such as data read from a stream) or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, you should use the object returned by the method of a derived class. 請參閱 < 備註 > 一節的討論解碼技術和考量的參考主題。See the Remarks section of the reference topic for a discussion of decoding techniques and considerations. 請注意，確切的行為方法特定實作取決於該定義的後援策略物件。Note that the precise behavior of the method for a particular implementation depends on the fallback strategy defined for that object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 選擇後援策略 」 一節[字元編碼方式在.NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)主題。For more information, see the "Choosing a Fallback Strategy" section of the [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md) topic. ## Examples 下列範例會讀取的 utf-8 編碼的字串表示的二進位檔案從物件。The following example reads a UTF-8 encoded string from a binary file represented by a object. 對於小於 2048 個位元組的檔案，它會讀取整個檔案的內容至位元組陣列，然後呼叫方法進行解碼。For files that are smaller than 2,048 bytes, it reads the contents of the entire file into a byte array and calls the method to perform the decoding. 對於較大的檔案，它 2048 個位元組一次讀取的位元組陣列，呼叫方法來判斷多少字元包含在陣列中，然後呼叫方法進行解碼。For larger files, it reads 2,048 bytes at a time into a byte array, calls the method to determine how many characters are contained in the array, and then calls the method to perform the decoding. [!code-csharp[System.Text.Encoding.GetString#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.Encoding.GetString/CS/getstring1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.Encoding.GetString#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.Encoding.GetString/VB/getstring1.vb#2)] 此範例會使用下列文字，應該儲存至名為 Utf8Example.txt 的 utf-8 編碼檔。The example uses the following text, which should be saved to a UTF-8 encoded file named Utf8Example.txt. ``` This is a UTF-8-encoded file that contains primarily Latin text, although it does list the first twelve letters of the Russian (Cyrillic) alphabet: А б в г д е ё ж з и й к The goal is to save this file, then open and decode it as a binary stream. ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您需要的標頭名稱的編碼方式，您應該呼叫方法屬性。If you need an encoding for a header name, you should call the method with the property. 通常方法會擷取不同的編碼方式與呼叫中提供的測試編碼。Often the method retrieves a different encoding from the test encoding furnished in the call. 通常只有電子郵件應用程式必須擷取這類的編碼方式。Generally only email applications need to retrieve such an encoding. 在某些情況下，值屬性會對應到定義該編碼的國際標準。In some cases, the value of the property corresponds to the international standard that defines that encoding. 這並不表示實作符合以完整模式和標準。This doesn't mean that the implementation complies in full with that standard. 請注意，傳回要用來描述的編碼方式名稱。Note that returns the name to use to describe an encoding. 屬性可定義不同的編碼方式，可能會產生更好的電子郵件應用程式，例如。The property defines a different encoding that might work better for an email application, for example. 不過，不建議使用這個屬性來定義的編碼方式。However, use of the property to define the encoding is not recommended. ## Examples 下列範例擷取每個編碼不同的名稱，並顯示與一個或多個名稱不同於編碼。The following example retrieves the different names for each encoding and displays the encodings with one or more names that are different from . 它會顯示但不會針對它比較。It displays but does not compare against it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您註冊類別，衍生自讓字元可用在不會為不支援它們的平台上編碼。The method allows you to register a class derived from that makes character encodings available on a platform that does not otherwise support them. 編碼提供者註冊後，可以藉由呼叫任何擷取它所支援的編碼方式多載。Once the encoding provider is registered, the encodings that it supports can be retrieved by calling any overload. 如果有多個編碼提供者，方法嘗試擷取指定的編碼方式從 開始使用最新註冊的每個提供者。If there are multiple encoding providers, the method attempts to retrieve a specified encoding from each provider starting with the one most recently registered. 使用註冊其編碼提供者方法也會修改的行為[Encoding.GetEncoding(Int32)]()和[EncodingProvider.GetEncoding (Int32、 EncoderFallback，DecoderFallback)](xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetEncoding(System.Int32,System.Text.EncoderFallback,System.Text.DecoderFallback))方法傳遞的引數時`0`:Registering an encoding provider by using the method also modifies the behavior of the [Encoding.GetEncoding(Int32)]() and [EncodingProvider.GetEncoding(Int32, EncoderFallback, DecoderFallback)](xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetEncoding(System.Int32,System.Text.EncoderFallback,System.Text.DecoderFallback)) methods when passed an argument of `0`: - 如果已註冊的提供者，方法會傳回 Windows 作業系統上執行時，符合系統使用中的字碼頁的編碼方式。If the registered provider is the , the method returns the encoding that matches the system active code page when running on the Windows operating system. - 自訂編碼提供者可以選擇哪一種編碼時傳回的其中一個方法多載會傳遞的引數`0`。A custom encoding provider can choose which encoding to return when either of these method overloads is passed an argument of `0`. 提供者也可以選擇不會傳回所需的編碼方式方法傳回`null`。The provider can also choose to not return an encoding by having the method return `null`. [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] 包含一個編碼提供者， ，這會使可用編碼會在完整的.NET Framework，但不適用於[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]。 includes one encoding provider, , that makes the encodings available that are present in the full .NET Framework but are not available in [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]. 根據預設，[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]僅支援 Unicode 編碼方式、 ASCII 和字碼頁 28591。By default, [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] only supports the Unicode encodings, ASCII, and code page 28591. 如果相同的編碼提供者會使用多個呼叫方法，在第一個方法呼叫註冊提供者。If the same encoding provider is used in multiple calls to the method, only the first method call registers the provider. 後續呼叫都會被忽略。Subsequent calls are ignored. 如果方法呼叫註冊多個提供者可處理相同的編碼方式，最後一個已註冊的提供者是用於所有的編碼和解碼作業。If the method is called to register multiple providers that handle the same encoding, the last registered provider is the used for all encoding and decoding operations. 任何先前已註冊的提供者會被忽略。Any previously registered providers are ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援的.NET Framework，並討論使用編碼的 Unicode 編碼的相關資訊，請參閱[字元編碼方式在.NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)。For information about the encodings supported by the .NET Framework and a discussion of which Unicode encoding to use, see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md). 這個屬性所傳回的物件可能沒有適當的行為，您的應用程式。The object that is returned by this property may not have the appropriate behavior for your app. 它會使用取代後援，來取代無法編碼的每個字串和無法解碼的每個位元組以問號 ("？") 字元。It uses replacement fallback to replace each string that it cannot encode and each byte that it cannot decode with a question mark ("?") character. 相反地，您可以呼叫建構函式來具現化極小的位元組由小到大物件可能是其後援或，如下列範例所示。Instead, you can call the constructor to instantiate a little endian object whose fallback is either an or a , as the following example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.Text.Encoding.Unicode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.encoding.unicode/cs/unicode1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.Encoding.Unicode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.encoding.unicode/vb/unicode1.vb#2)] ## Examples 下列範例會決定編碼的字元陣列所需的位元組數目、 編碼字元，並顯示產生的位元組數。The following example determines the number of bytes required to encode a character array, encodes the characters, and displays the resulting bytes. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在過去有受到限制，7 個位元，例如 NNTP 和某些電子郵件應用程式的環境中，主要會使用 utf-7 編碼。UTF-7 encoding is used primarily in environments that historically have been restricted to 7 bits, such as NNTP and some email applications. 強固性和安全性問題，因為您不應該使用 8 位元環境中編碼 UTF7 其中 utf-8 編碼方式可以改用。Because of issues with robustness and security, you should not use UTF7 encoding in 8-bit environments where UTF-8 encoding can be used instead. ## Examples 下列範例會決定編碼的字元陣列所需的位元組數目、 編碼字元，並顯示產生的位元組數。The following example determines the number of bytes required to encode a character array, encodes the characters, and displays the resulting bytes. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回可將 Unicode （UTF 16 編碼） 的字元編碼成位元組序列的一到四個，每個字元，並可將解碼 UTF 8 編碼的位元組陣列為 Unicode （UTF 16 編碼） 個字元的物件。This property returns a object that encodes Unicode (UTF-16-encoded) characters into a sequence of one to four bytes per character, and that decodes a UTF-8-encoded byte array to Unicode (UTF-16-encoded) characters. 支援的.NET Framework，並討論使用編碼的 Unicode 字元編碼的相關資訊，請參閱[字元編碼方式在.NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)。For information about the character encodings supported by the .NET Framework and a discussion of which Unicode encoding to use, see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md). 這個屬性所傳回的物件可能沒有適當的行為，您的應用程式。The object that is returned by this property might not have the appropriate behavior for your app. - 它會傳回提供 Unicode 位元組順序標記 (BOM) 的物件。It returns a object that provides a Unicode byte order mark (BOM). 若要具現化不會提供 BOM UTF8 編碼方式，呼叫的任何多載建構函式。To instantiate a UTF8 encoding that doesn't provide a BOM, call any overload of the constructor. - 它會傳回物件使用取代後援，來以問號取代每一個無法編碼的字串和無法解碼的每個位元組 ("？") 字元。It returns a object that uses replacement fallback to replace each string that it can't encode and each byte that it can't decode with a question mark ("?") character. 相反地，您可以呼叫建構函式來具現化物件可能是其後援或，如下列範例所示。Instead, you can call the constructor to instantiate a object whose fallback is either an or a , as the following example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.Text.Encoding.UTF8#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.encoding.utf8/cs/encoding.utf8.1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.Encoding.UTF8#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.encoding.utf8/vb/encoding.utf8.1.vb#1)] ## Examples 下列範例會定義陣列，其中包含下列字元：The following example defines an array that consists of the following characters: - 拉丁文小寫字母 Z (U + 007A)LATIN SMALL LETTER Z (U+007A) - 字母的拉丁小型 (U + 0061)LATIN SMALL LETTER A (U+0061) - 結合音符 (U + 0306)COMBINING BREVE (U+0306) - 銳角 (U + 01FD) 使用的拉丁小寫字母 AELATIN SMALL LETTER AE WITH ACUTE (U+01FD) - 希臘文的小寫字母 BETA (U + 03B2)GREEK SMALL LETTER BETA (U+03B2) - Surrogate 字組 (U + D800 U + DD54) 形成希臘 ACROPHONIC ATTIC 一個千位 STATERS (U + 10154)。A surrogate pair (U+D800 U+DD54) that forms GREEK ACROPHONIC ATTIC ONE THOUSAND STATERS (U+10154). 它會顯示每個字元的 utf-16 字碼單位，並決定 utf-8 編碼器編碼的字元陣列所需的位元組數目。It displays the UTF-16 code units of each character and determines the number of bytes required by a UTF-8 encoder to encode the character array. 然後將字元編碼，並顯示結果的 UTF 8 編碼位元組。It then encodes the characters and displays the resulting UTF-8-encoded bytes. [!code-csharp[System.Text.Encoding.UTF8#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.encoding.utf8/cs/example1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.Encoding.UTF8#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.encoding.utf8/vb/example1.vb#2)]
